VITTY


How to use?

  1. Upload a screenshot of your timetable
    • Ensure that the screenshot is taken directly from VTOP. It should fit in one single image.
    • DO NOT upload a screenshot that has been compressed/ sent through social media.
  2. Individual slot data can be edited by clicking on the edit button. Copy the complete slot details ( for eg. A1-CSE2011-ETH-SJT405-UGF )
  3. If unsatisfied, click on the three dots and select Upload as Text. Copy your complete timetable from VTOP in text format.
  4. When done, click on Upload.
  5. Download the app from https://dscv.it/vitty-app.
  6. For next semester, click on the 3 dots and select Change Timetable to upload a new timetable
